Author: slushypandaboobs
Text: I know, right? I am just on YouTube to see drawing videos and painting time lapses and these recommendations show up randomly like 1 month after recovery and I gotta trigger myself. I hate this new culture of diet cold wars where people start demonizing food groups and healthy foods. It’s so harmful and just makes me take deep breaths and remember that those niche diets are pure fluff.

Author: _ohmi
Text: Because advertisers have all your info and want to get you to click their links, controversial or not. It’s so fucky.
